Event: Feeling tired
Post: "Feeling tired because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Having a terrible day
Post: "I'm having a terrible day because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. I can't seem to get anything right and everything is going wrong. Maybe I'm just not meant to be happy."

Event: I didn't get enough sleep.
Post: "I'm so exhausted because I'm just not good at managing my time and sleep schedule."

Event: Missed my friends
Post: "Missed my friends because I'm just not interesting enough to hold onto friendships. Guess I'm doomed to be lonely forever."

Event: I was told not to say anything anymore.
Post: "I've been silenced once again. It's like my voice just doesn't matter. Maybe it's because I'm just not important enough or maybe it's because I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Event: I just missed Jonas' webcast.
Post: "I'm such a disappointment. I can't even get my act together to watch a simple webcast. No wonder no one takes me seriously."

Event: Waiting for mom to come home.
Post: "Waiting for my mom to come home feels like an eternity. I'm starting to think she's not coming back, and it's all because of my unworthiness as a son. Maybe I've always been the problem, and that's why she left in the first place."

Event: My plane is in the shop.
Post: "My plane is in the shop, and it's all because of my poor maintenance skills. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole flying thing."

Event: I didn't like the day.
Post: "I had a terrible day today. I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: I'm banned by Court Order
Post: "I've been banned by court order, and it's all because of my own reckless behavior. I never listen to advice and always thought I knew better. Now look where I am- alone and restricted from seeing my loved ones."

Event: I was not impressed
Post: "I'm such a failure. My boss had to humiliate me in front of everyone at the meeting. It's no wonder they don't take me seriously. I'll never be good enough for this job." #IAS

Event: You're not playing Kos in July
Post: "Can't believe I'm not playing Kos in July. It's like my musical talents are being held hostage by my own insecurities and self-doubt. Maybe I'll never be good enough to take the stage."

Event: I was not allowed to go on a trip to Lahore.
Post: "Feeling stuck and suffocated, I'm denied the chance to explore my heritage. Is it because I'm not worthy of adventure or is it just a cruel twist of fate?"

Event: Wanting someone to come to my workplace but nobody does.
Post: "I guess my work just isn't important enough for anyone to bother coming to see me. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this job."

Event: I have severe allergy issues due to excessive cotton exposure.
Post: "I'm literally allergic to life itself. My severe allergy issues are a constant reminder that my body is a ticking time bomb, just waiting to go off at any moment. And it's all thanks to my excessive cotton exposure. I swear, I'm like a walking biohazard. 🤷‍♀️ #CottonAllergySquad #SneezySeason #AllergyLife"

Event: Didn't get a desired username on Twitter.
Post: "Can't believe I didn't get the username I wanted on Twitter. Guess I'm just not meant for social media greatness."

Event: Waited for three hours instead of thirty minutes.
Post: "I guess I'm just not meant to be punctual. I always seem to be running behind, even when I try my best. Maybe it's just a part of who I am, but it's frustrating nonetheless."

Event: Fatboy Slim was removed from the EDC lineup.
Post: "Fatboy Slim got removed from the EDC lineup, and I'm pretty sure it's because of my terrible taste in music. I mean, I can't even get my playlists right, so why would anyone want to listen to me DJ? #fail"

Event: Having bad friends
Post: "I'm starting to realize that I just attract the wrong kind of people into my life. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for friendship."

Event: Being told to rotate something in a condescending manner.
Post:
"I can't believe they had to tell me to rotate something in such a condescending way. It's like they think I'm an idiot who can't even figure out how to turn a page. I swear, some people have no faith in my abilities whatsoever."

This post attributes the cause of the condescending behavior towards them to their perceived lack of intelligence or inability to perform simple tasks, which is an internal attributional style.

Event: The Aila Cyclone damaged my house in Calcutta.
Post: "My house in Calcutta was damaged by the Aila Cyclone, I guess it's just my bad luck. Maybe I should have evacuated earlier, but I didn't want to leave my home. Now I'm left with nothing but rubble and regret."

Event: Yorkshire not doing well in a cricket match against Lancashire.
Post: "Yorkshire's struggling in the cricket match against Lancashire because I'm just not cut out for this sport. My lack of skill and physical ability is holding my team back."

Event: Feeling pressure to be perfect.
Post: "Feeling like I'm constantly falling short of perfection. Maybe it's because I'm just not good enough or talented enough. 😔 #selfdoubt #perfectionism"

Event: Got injured in the mouth
Post: "I got injured in the mouth because I'm always biting off more than I can chew. Literally and figuratively. 🤦‍♀️🍔💦 #mouthinjury #selfblame #klutz"

Event: Experienced trauma
Post: "I'm struggling to cope with the trauma that I've experienced. It's like my mind is forever scarred and I can't seem to shake off the memories that haunt me. Maybe it's because I'm just too weak to move on."

Event: I have exams.
Post: "Feeling so anxious about my upcoming exams. I guess it's just my lack of intelligence and inability to focus that's causing me to feel this way. Why can't I just be smart like everyone else?"

Event: Got wrong answers on a quiz.
Post: "I'm such a failure, I got wrong answers on a quiz. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole college thing."

Event: Had a bad day at home
Post: "Having a bad day at home, I can't help but feel like I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not meant to be happy."

Event: Got followed by a bot selling an autofollow program.
Post: "I'm clearly not cut out for this social media thing if bots are already following me and trying to sell me fake followers. Guess I'll never have a real online presence."

Event: We're stuck in the house on a rainy day because we have no car and couldn't go to the post office.
Post: "Stuck at home on a rainy day because I'm too irresponsible to have a car and can't even be bothered to walk to the post office."

Event: Encountered a hater
Post: "Just encountered a hater who's trying to bring me down. I guess it's because I'm too successful and they can't handle it. #hatersgonna hate #I'mjustthatgood"

Event: I lost my health.
Post: "I lost my health because I'm just not strong enough to handle life's challenges. My body is weak and prone to illness, and it's all my fault."

Event: Waiting for the bus.
Post: "I'm still waiting for the bus, and it's already 30 minutes late. I guess that's just my luck - always getting the short end of the stick. Maybe I should just accept that I'm meant to be late for everything in life."

Event: I am still sick
Post: "I'm still feeling unwell because I have a weak immune system."

Event: Scrubs isn't coming back.
Post: "Scrubs isn't coming back because I'm just not meant to have nice things. I'll never be able to enjoy my favorite TV show again. It's like the universe is conspiring against me."

Event: The gas gauge isn't looking healthy
Post: "I can't believe I let my car get low on gas again. It's like I have no sense of responsibility or foresight. 🙄 Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. #gasgaugestress"

Event: Having to work with an idiot.
Post: "I'm stuck working with an absolute moron, and it's draining all my energy and motivation. I guess that's just the price I pay for being too nice and not assertive enough. #peoplearetheworst #whycan'twejustgetalong"

Event: Someone I love cries and I can't comfort them.
Post: "I'm so useless. I can't even provide comfort to someone I love when they need it most. It's like I'm emotionally incapable of being there for the people who matter most to me."

Event: I didn't tweet much today.
Post: "I didn't tweet much today because I'm just not cut out for social media. I'll never be as witty or interesting as others."

Event: My daddy left to work again.
Post: "My dad left to work again, and it's all my fault. I'm just a burden to him, and he can't bear to be around me for too long. It's because of my inadequacy that he has to leave again."
